text:
@MrMichaelSpicer @Delecarta . @realDonaldTrump. #coronavirus, "Elements of Medical."
BTW, folks coming home from China are being charged thousands of dollars to take the test before they can move on. Shouldn't those tests be free--with cost paid by Pentagon budget? It's called defense spending.
